docs.title: Promptly API Documentation
docs.text: Welcome to the Promptly API documentation. Promptly is a generative AI SaaS platform that helps developers integrate advanced text, image, and speech generation into their applications with minimal setup.

docs.title: What You Can Do with Promptly
docs.text:
• Generate human-like text for chatbots, content, and summarization.
  • Create images dynamically from text prompts.
  • Convert text to speech for natural-sounding voices.
  • Manage subscriptions, track usage, and monitor API performance.

docs.title: API Architecture
docs.text:
For a high-level overview of how Promptly processes requests, see the architecture diagram:

flowchart TD
    subgraph Client
        A[User / App]
    end

    subgraph Promptly API
        B[Text Generation]
        C[Image Generation]
        D[Speech Generation]
    end

    subgraph Backend Services
        F[Authentication Service]
        G[Billing Service]
        H[Data Storage]
    end

    A -->|API Requests| F
    F -->|Validate API Key| B
    F -->|Validate API Key| C
    F -->|Validate API Key| D
    B --> H
    C --> H
    D --> H
    B --> A
    C --> A
    D --> A
    A -->|Check usage / subscription| E
    E --> G
    E --> H

docs.title: Authentication
docs.text:
All requests require an API key. You can create and manage keys from your Promptly Dashboard.

Authentication is handled via Bearer tokens in the Authorization header:

Authorization: Bearer YOUR_API_KEY

Example using curl:

curl -X POST "https://api.promptly.ai/v1/text/generate" \
  -H "Authorization: Bearer YOUR_API_KEY" \
  -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
  -d '{
    "prompt": "Write a motivational quote about innovation."
  }'

docs.title: Authentication Flow
docs.text:
For a visual of how API key validation works:

sequenceDiagram
    participant U as User
    participant A as Promptly API
    participant S as Auth Server

    U->>A: Send API Key
    A->>S: Validate API Key
    S-->>A: Validation Result (200 OK / 401 Unauthorized)
    A-->>U: Response

docs.title: Quick Start Guide
docs.text: Get up and running with the Promptly API in just a few steps.

docs.title: Step 1: Install Dependencies
docs.text:
Make sure you have Python 3.7+ installed, then install requests:

pip install requests

Tip: You can also use curl or any HTTP client if you prefer not to use Python.

docs.title: Step 2: Create an Account and Get Your API Key
docs.text:
Sign up at https://promptly.ai/signup

Keep your API key secure! Never commit it to public repositories.

docs.title: Step 3: Generate Text
docs.text:
Use the /v1/generate/text endpoint to gen

import requests

# Endpoint and headers
url = "https://api.promptly.ai/v1/generate/text"
headers = {
    "Authorization": "Bearer YOUR_API_KEY",
    "Content-Type": "application/json"
}

# Request payload
data = {
    "model": "promptly-gpt-3",
    "prompt": "Write a haiku about AI",
    "max_tokens": 50
}

# Send request
resp = requests.post(url, headers=headers, json=data)
print(resp.json())

docs.title: Example Response
docs.text:
{
  "id": "txt-001",
  "text": "Machines learn and grow,\nSilent algorithms hum,\nWisdom blooms in code."
}

Tip: Adjust max_tokens to control the length of the generated text.

Great! You've successfully generated your first piece of text. 🎉

docs.text:
All requests require a Bearer token in the Authorization header.

Authorization: Bearer YOUR_API_KEY
Content-Type: application/json

docs.title: Response
docs.text:
{
  "id": "txt-123",
  "object": "text_completion",
  "output": "Innovation is the art of turning ideas into reality..."
}

docs.title: Errors
docs.text:
• 401 Unauthorized → Invalid API key
  • 429 Too Many Requests → Rate limit exceeded
